I started studying Film Studies before transitioning into Computer Science & Business - driven by a curiosity of building products as a whole
Making things a reality is my passion; whether that’s in videography, software development, or even dreaming up new business ideas

textEmp: That’s why I’m interested in the intersection of Product & Software Engineering, a way for me to build things across technology, business, and design
